mod.name: Ruina
mod.description: An alternate Act mod based on Library of Ruina.

cards.name: Apocalypse
cards.description:
Deal 22 damage.
Deals 50% more damage if your HP is at or below 50%.
Deals 50% more damage to enemies with 50% or less HP.

cards.name: Apocalypse+
cards.description:
Deal 26 damage.
Deals 50% more damage if your HP is at or below 50%.
Deals 50% more damage to enemies with 50% or less HP.

cards.name: Aspiration
cards.description:
Gain 3 Strength.
Lose half of your current HP. At the end of combat, heal the HP lost by this card.

cards.name: Aspiration+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Strength.
Lose half of your current HP. At the end of combat, heal the HP lost by this card.

cards.name: Beak
cards.description: At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of the highest cost card in your hand to 0 this combat and give it Exhaust.

cards.name: Beak+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of the highest cost card in your hand to 0 this combat and give it Exhaust.

cards.name: Black Swan
cards.description:
Apply 4 ruina:Erosion.
If you applied a debuff this turn, this card costs 0.

cards.name: Black Swan+
cards.description:
Apply 5 ruina:Erosion.
If you applied a debuff this turn, this card costs 0. [diffAddS]
Shuffle this card back into your draw pile. [diffAddE]

cards.name: Blind Rage
cards.description:
Deal 26 damage to ALL enemies.
Take 6 damage.
If your HP is at or below 50%, this card costs 0.

cards.name: Blind Rage+
cards.description:
Deal 30 damage to ALL enemies.
Take 4 damage.
If your HP is at or below 50%, this card costs 0.

cards.name: Cobalt Scar
cards.description: Whenever you play 5 Attacks, deal 20 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Cobalt Scar+
cards.description: Whenever you play 5 Attacks, deal 20 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Crimson Scar
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Scry 2.
For each card discarded, gain 3 Vigor.

cards.name: Crimson Scar+
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Scry 3.
For each card discarded, gain 3 Vigor.

cards.name: Da Capo
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage to ALL enemies.
Upgrade this card permanently.
Can be Upgraded 5 times.

cards.name: Dead Silence
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
Take an extra turn after this one.
If this card killed an enemy, gain [E] [E] next turn.

cards.name: Dead Silence+
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
Take an extra turn after this one.
If this card killed an enemy, gain [E] [E] next turn.

cards.name: Faded Memories
cards.description: Draw 1 card for every enemy in combat.

cards.name: Faded Memories+
cards.description: Draw 1 card for every enemy in combat.

cards.name: Faint Aroma
cards.description: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage to an enemy, it loses that much HP.

cards.name: Faint Aroma+
cards.description: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage to an enemy, it loses that much HP.

cards.name: False Throne
cards.description: Next turn, put ALL non-Status non-Curse cards from your exhaust pile into your hand and give them Ethereal.

cards.name: False Throne+
cards.description: Next turn, put ALL non-Status non-Curse cards from your exhaust pile into your hand and give them Ethereal.

cards.name: Finale
cards.description: Deal 28 damage [diffAddS] and apply 2 Vulnerable [diffAddE] to ALL enemies.

cards.name: First Movement
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.
Upgrade this card permanently.
Can be Upgraded 5 times.

cards.name: Fourth Match Flame
cards.description:
Add 1 Burn into your discard pile.
At the end of your turn, deal 7 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Fourth Match Flame+
cards.description:
Add 1 Burn into your discard pile.
At the end of your turn, deal 9 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Fourth Movement
cards.description:
Deal 22 damage to ALL enemies.
Upgrade this card permanently.
Can be Upgraded 5 times.

cards.name: Fragments from Somewhere
cards.description:
Steal the enemy's Block.
Deal 17 damage.

cards.name: Fragments from Somewhere+
cards.description:
Steal the enemy's Block.
Deal 22 damage.

cards.name: Frost Splinter
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain [E] , draw 1 card, and ruina:Freeze 1 card.

cards.name: Frost Splinter+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain [E] , draw 1 card, and ruina:Freeze 1 card.

cards.name: Gold Rush
cards.description:
Gain 4 Strength.
If the last card played this combat was an Attack, double your Strength.

cards.name: Gold Rush+
cards.description:
Gain 6 Strength.
If the last card played this combat was an Attack, double your Strength.

cards.name: Green Stem
cards.description:
Apply 6 Poison.
If this card is Exhausted, double ALL enemies' Poison.
Exhaustive 2.

cards.name: Green Stem+
cards.description:
Apply 8 Poison.
If this card is Exhausted, double ALL enemies' Poison.
Exhaustive 2.

cards.name: Grinder Mk. 5-2
cards.description: The first time you deal 15 unblocked attack damage each turn, gain [E] next turn.

cards.name: Grinder Mk. 5-2+
cards.description: The first time you deal 15 unblocked attack damage each turn, gain [E] next turn.

cards.name: Harmony
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Gain 1 Strength.
If Fatal, permanantly increase this card's Strength gain by 1.

cards.name: Harmony+
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage.
Gain 1 Strength.
If Fatal, permanantly increase this card's Strength gain by 1.

cards.name: Harvest
cards.description:
Deal 40 damage.
This card deals less damage as your HP percent drops (deals max damage at full HP).

cards.name: Harvest+
cards.description:
Deal 40 damage.
This card deals less damage as your HP percent drops (deals max damage at full HP). [diffAddS]
Gain 5 Block. [diffAddE]

cards.name: Heaven
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block X times.
Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal damage back equal to your remaining Block.

cards.name: Heaven+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block X times.
Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal damage back equal to your remaining Block.

cards.name: Homing Instinct
cards.description:
Exhaust up to 1 card.
At the start of your turn, gain [E] equal to the cost of the exhausted card.

cards.name: Homing Instinct+
cards.description:
Exhaust up to 1 card.
At the start of your turn, gain [E] equal to the cost of the exhausted card.

cards.name: Hornet
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
The next Attack you play costs 0 and deals double damage.

cards.name: Hornet+
cards.description:
Deal 22 damage.
The next Attack you play costs 0 and deals double damage.

cards.name: In the Name of Love and Hate
cards.description: Deal 42 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: In the Name of Love and Hate+
cards.description: Deal 54 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Justitia
cards.description:
If the enemy's HP is at or below 30%, kill it.
Enemy loses 11 HP.

cards.name: Justitia+
cards.description:
If the enemy's HP is at or below 30%, kill it.
Enemy loses 14 HP.

cards.name: Laetitia
cards.description: The first 0 or 1 cost card you play each turn is played twice.

cards.name: Laetitia+
cards.description:
The first 0 or 1 cost card you play each turn is played twice. [diffAddS]
Refund 1. [diffAddE]

cards.name: Lamp
cards.description:
Enemy loses 4 Strength this turn.
Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal 8 damage back.

cards.name: Lamp+
cards.description:
Enemy loses 6 Strength this turn.
Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal 10 damage back.

cards.name: Lumber
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Exhaust up to 2 cards. For each Attack Exhausted, add its base damage to this card's damage.
Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

cards.name: Lumber+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Exhaust up to 2 cards. For each Attack Exhausted, add its base damage to this card's damage.
Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

cards.name: Magic Bullet
cards.description: Draw 3 cards and give them Retain.

cards.name: Magic Bullet+
cards.description: Draw 4 cards and give them Retain.

cards.name: Marionette
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Draw 2 cards.
Increase this card's cost by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Marionette+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Draw 2 cards.
Increase this card's cost by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Mimicry
cards.description: Deal 13 damage. Heal HP equal to unblocked damage.

cards.name: Mimicry+
cards.description: Deal 16 damage. Heal HP equal to unblocked damage.

cards.name: Nihil
cards.description:
ALL enemies lose 2 Strength.
If you have no cards in hand, this effect is doubled.

cards.name: Nihil+
cards.description:
ALL enemies lose 3 Strength.
If you have no cards in hand, this effect is doubled.

cards.name: Our Galaxy
cards.description: Choose a card in your draw pile that costs X or less and play a copy of it.

cards.name: Our Galaxy+
cards.description: Choose a card in your draw pile that costs X or less and play a copy of it.

cards.name: Paradise Lost
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, Exhaust up to 1 card.
Whenever 12 cards are Exhausted, ALL enemies lose 150 HP.

cards.name: Paradise Lost+
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, Exhaust up to 1 card.
Whenever 12 cards are Exhausted, ALL enemies lose 200 HP.

cards.name: Penitence
cards.description:
Heal 8 HP.
Remove all of your debuffs.

cards.name: Penitence+
cards.description:
Heal 8 HP.
Remove all of your debuffs.

cards.name: Pleasure
cards.description:
Autoplay.
Gain [E] and 3 Thorns.
If this card is Exhausted, lose 8 HP.
Exhaustive 3.

cards.name: Pleasure+
cards.description:
Autoplay.
Gain [E] and 4 Thorns.
If this card is Exhausted, lose 6 HP.
Exhaustive 3.

cards.name: Red Eyes
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Double the next debuff you apply to the enemy.

cards.name: Red Eyes+
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
Double the next debuff you apply to the enemy.

cards.name: Regret
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
Deal 13 damage again for each Status and Curse in your hand.

cards.name: Regret+
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage.
Deal 16 damage again for each Status and Curse in your hand.

cards.name: Remorse
cards.description:
ruina:Manifest.
Deal 25 damage.
Apply 3 Weak and Vulnerable.

cards.name: Remorse+
cards.description:
ruina:Manifest.
Deal 25 damage.
Apply 3 Weak and Vulnerable.

cards.name: Sanguine Desire
cards.description:
ruina:Manifest.
Deal 18 damage.
Apply 4 ruina:Bleed for every [E] paid for by ruina:Manifest.

cards.name: Sanguine Desire+
cards.description:
ruina:Manifest.
Deal 22 damage.
Apply 5 ruina:Bleed for every [E] paid for by ruina:Manifest.

cards.name: Second Movement
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage to ALL enemies.
Upgrade this card permanently.
Can be Upgraded 5 times.

cards.name: Smile
cards.description: Deal 16 damage and apply 2 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Smile+
cards.description: Deal 16 damage and apply 3 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Solemn Lament
cards.description:
ruina:Manifest.
Gain 1 Intangible.
If this card's cost was only paid by ruina:Manifest, add a copy of it into your discard pile.

cards.name: Solemn Lament+
cards.description:
ruina:Manifest.
Gain 1 Intangible.
If this card's cost was only paid by ruina:Manifest, add a copy of it into your discard pile.

cards.name: Sound of a Star
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.
This card's damage is increased by the amount of Block you've gained this combat.
Exhaustive 2.

cards.name: Sound of a Star+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.
This card's damage is increased by the amount of Block you've gained this combat.
Exhaustive 2.

cards.name: Sword Sharpened With Tears
cards.description:
Apply 2 Weak.
When you play this card on the same enemy 3 times, instead apply 1 Stun and exhaust this card.

cards.name: Sword Sharpened With Tears+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Weak.
[diffAddS] Shuffle this card into your draw pile.
[diffAddE] When you play this card on the same enemy 3 times, instead apply 1 Stun and exhaust this card.

cards.name: The Forgotten
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Enemy loses Strength this turn equal to unblocked damage dealt.

cards.name: The Forgotten+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Enemy loses Strength this turn equal to unblocked damage dealt.

cards.name: Third Movement
cards.description:
Deal 17 damage to ALL enemies.
Upgrade this card permanently.
Can be Upgraded 5 times.

cards.name: Thirst
cards.description:
Apply 9 ruina:Bleed.
This turn, whenever you attack an enemy with ruina:Bleed, gain 1 Strength.

cards.name: Thirst+
cards.description:
Apply 9 ruina:Bleed.
This turn, whenever you attack an enemy with ruina:Bleed, gain 1 Strength.

cards.name: Today's Expression
cards.description:
Choose one:
Gain 18 Block.
Gain 18 Block next turn.

cards.name: Today's Expression+
cards.description:
Choose one:
Gain 23 Block.
Gain 23 Block next turn.

cards.name: Twilight
cards.description:
ruina:Manifest.
Deal 15 damage and apply Weak equal to the [E] paid for by ruina:Manifest to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Twilight+
cards.description:
ruina:Manifest.
Deal 20 damage and apply Weak equal to the [E] paid for by ruina:Manifest to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Wingbeat
cards.description:
Exhaust up to X cards.
Heal HP and gain Dexterity equal to their combined costs.

cards.name: Wingbeat+
cards.description:
Exhaust up to X cards.
Heal HP and gain Dexterity equal to their combined costs.

cards.name: Wrist Cutter
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E] .
Add 1 Wound with Retain to your hand.

cards.name: Wrist Cutter+
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E] .
Add 1 Wound with Retain to your hand.

relics.name: Book of Someone
relics.description: At the end of combat, heal 35% of your HP.
relics.flavorText: Some must fight so that all may be free.

relics.name: False Present
relics.description: Upon pickup, lose 7 Max HP. The first 2 cards you draw each combat cost 0 until played.
relics.flavorText: Poor Ozma. She didn't know that lying adults don't approach others without reason.

relics.name: Four Trigrams
relics.description:
At the start of your turn, randomly activate an effect that hasn't been activated this combat:
Gain 1 Strength.
Gain 1 Dexterity.
Gain [E] .
Draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: The balance of the City must be upheld.

relics.name: Goodbye
relics.description: The first Attack you play each combat deals double damage.
relics.flavorText: It tries to mimic humans. Looking into a mirror, mumbling to itself, trying to fix its skeletal structure . . . it's as if it was trying to become human.

relics.name: Life Fibers
relics.description: The next time you die, heal 4 HP instead. At the end of combat, increase the amount healed by 4.
relics.flavorText: When night falls in the Backstreets, they will come.

relics.name: Lowell's Gift
relics.description: At the start of your 3rd turn, gain 2 Strength and 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: For you I'd steal the stars.

relics.name: Malice
relics.description: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL enemies. If your HP is at or below 50%, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies instead.
relics.flavorText: The inherent malice caused all life to crumble as soon as it bloomed.

relics.name: Overexertion
relics.description:
Start each combat with an additional [E] [E] .
Gain 1 Weak and Frail at the start of your second turn.
relics.flavorText: She just had to keep pushing forward. Keep on pushing until the way was clear. Keep on pushing until she could push no more.

relics.name: Prescript
relics.description:
Prescripts:
1. Encounter 3 normal enemies. 0/3
2. Obtain 3 Common cards. 0/3
Once completed, transforms into a special relic.
relics.flavorText: A set of bizarre instructions. Who in their right mind would come up with these?

relics.name: Prescript's Grace
relics.description: At the start of combat, randomly chooses between Attack, Skill, and Power. The first card played of the chosen type is played twice.
relics.flavorText: It all made sense now. All those pointless endeavours converged onto a single, definite meaning.

relics.name: Strongest
relics.description: When you deal 15 unblocked attack damage in a single turn, gain 1 Strength. Can only trigger once per turn.
relics.flavorText: The courage to protect others. That is what separates the mighty from the meek.

relics.name: The Seventh Bullet
relics.description: Gain 2 Strength at the start of combat. Whenever you play 7 Attacks, take 3 damage.
relics.flavorText: One day, the marksman realized the Devil no longer followed him. He pondered why, then realized that his soul had already fallen to Hell from the beginning.

relics.name: Yesterday's Promise
relics.description: When you have insufficient [E] to play a card, you may instead pay 5 HP for every missing [E] .
relics.flavorText: Let me lend you my eyeglass, so you can have a closer look at what you just signed.

creatures.name: Big and Will Be Bad Wolf

keywords.name: Bleed
keywords.description: Whenever this creature attacks this turn, it takes damage equal to the amount of Bleed it has.

keywords.name: Contract
keywords.description: When you have insufficient [E] to play this card, you may instead pay 5 HP for every missing [E] .

keywords.name: Erosion
keywords.description: Creatures with Erosion receive more damage from attacks. Reduced by 1 at end of round.

keywords.name: Freeze
keywords.description: Frozen cards are Unplayable and Retain.

keywords.name: Manifest
keywords.description: When you have insufficient [E] to play this card, you may instead Exhaust 1 card for every missing [E] .

keywords.name: Protection
keywords.description: Creatures with Protection receive less damage from attacks. Reduced by 1 at end of round.
